frontmatter.title: Advanced Linguistic Patterns: Mastering Vowels and Clusters
Advanced Linguistic Patterns: Mastering Vowels and Clusters
frontmatter.description: To reach the top tier of competitive spelling, you must move beyond silent letters and master the complex ways English borrows from other languages. This list focuses on "tricky" patternsâ€”such as the double 'm' in Latin roots, the 'ou' and 'eau' vowel clusters from French, and the 'ch' sounds from Greek. Learning these rules will help you deduce the spelling of words you have never even seen before.
